comment.author: 22609699@N03
comment._content: A student formation of some kind?

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
HI Rick -- 

Good question! It was. Fans would snake around each other on the field during halftime doing a dance called the "Serpentine" or "Snake Dance." 

Check out this image in our other Flickr account -- and make sure to scroll down to the description for links & more information. 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/osuarchives/5101935815/]
